section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: Follow the procedure to install the License Service for stand-alone software.
section.note: The link directs you to the instructions on installing the standalone version of IBM License Service included in the IBM Cloud Pak™ Foundational Services. It is important to note that the BAMOE is not part of IBM Cloud Pak™.

section.p: After installing BAMOE Canvas and its dependencies following the installation tutorial, run the following commands depending on where BAMOE Canvas was installed.

li.codeblock: oc patch deployment <bamoe-canvas_deployment_name> -p \ '{"spec": {"template":{"metadata":{"annotations":{"productID":"46b14c7f2f894218a7879b3f6416024f", "productName": "IBM Decision Manager Open Edition", "productMetric": "VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR_CORE", "productChargedContainers": "All"}}}} }'

kubectl patch deployment <bamoe-canvas_deployment_name> -p \ '{"spec": {"template":{"metadata":{"annotations":{"productID":"46b14c7f2f894218a7879b3f6416024f", "productName": "IBM Decision Manager Open Edition", "productMetric": "VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR_CORE", "productChargedContainers": "All"}}}} }'
li.p: Where bamoe-canvas_deployment_name is the name of the Deployment resource created when you installed BAMOE Canvas.
If you have installed BAMOE Canvas by using yaml resources, the deployment resource must be edited to add the following lines:
li.codeblock: spec: ... template: metadata: annotations: productID: "46b14c7f2f894218a7879b3f6416024f" productName: "IBM Decision Manager Open Edition" productMetric: "VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR_CORE" productChargedContainers: "All"
